subject: All Star Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cardinals manager Tony La Russa has the privilege of filling out the roster for the National League All-Stars. Yet that means he may have to decide whether or not to include Barry Bonds on the team.
snippet: Cardinals manager Tony La Russa has the privilege of filling out the roster for the National League All-Stars. Yet that means he may have to decide whether or not to include Barry Bonds on the team.
